website_summaries.verdict: Great option if you are looking for a simple, protective case and see the product itself.
pros: High-quality case made from one of the best case companies out there
Clear case is handy particularly for those with rose gold colored iPads who want to the look of the product
cons: Not as slim as other cases

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product. Does not fit well over the on/off and volume buttons.
customer_reviews.text: This product is an imitation of what the real otterbox should be. Very very disappointed. It’s hard to use the volume buttons and the on/off button because the case does not fit well over these buttons. It’s definitely NOT the real deal. I would never buy these type of products again. .
customer_reviews.author: Rita Oliver

customer_reviews.title: The power and volume buttons are very difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the iPad mini 5th gen case. The case itself is okay. The power and especially the volume buttons are very hard to use. This is being used by a female friend and her fingers aren't strong enough to get them to work at all. I can get them to work, only with great difficulty. It's easier to pop the iPad out of the case than to try and get the buttons to work in the case. I was disappointed with the selection of cases available for the 5th gen mini. I hope that will improve in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Young

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my iPad Mini and wanted a different kind of case for it than I had used before and decided I liked the idea of being able to put stickers on my iPad (like I do on my laptops) since I couldn't find a case with enough protection and with a design I liked and that felt unique to me. I bought this clear OtterBox case and purchased the Apple Smart Cover, as well, to use together and they are perfect! My stickers are on the back and not at risk of getting worn off and I feel like the iPad is fully protected!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Slater

customer_reviews.title: not the Otterbox I am used to...
customer_reviews.text: Got it, put it on. The elastic pencil loop was loose, and after fiddling with it, came off, leaving a gap/space on the side that was rough and irritating. The "bar" on the otherside slightly wiggles.. it just isn't that SOLID fee I am used to with Otterbox. Gave it to a friend who was happy to have it...so Merry Christmas to her. I was unhappy with it, and although I will buy Otterbox again, this was not my best experience with their product.
customer_reviews.author: Juilianna

customer_reviews.title: Not a full-body case, but it protects well.
customer_reviews.text: Not a full-body case. It only protects the sides and back; however, this case protects them well. I love that it’s compatible with Apple’s Smart Cover, but I don’t like how difficult the buttons are to operate through the case.
customer_reviews.author: Paragot

customer_reviews.title: Showed up broken
customer_reviews.text: Just received this case from Amazon. I think I assumed because it's an Otterbox and it's expensive that it would be high quality and sturdy. It's not. It was cracked and broken when I removed it from the packaging so that's not a good sign. I'm swapping it out for a different style. I question the voracity of these positive reviews. Even it hadn't been broken, I'd have been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Keebler

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox Never Disappoints
customer_reviews.text: When I found out that Otterbox made the Symmetry series to fit the newest iPad mini, I knew I had to have one for my iPad. It’s kept it safe since I bought it months ago, and has withstood all impacts. The Apple Pencil holder and optional removal of the other side of the case to allow for the Apple folio makes it customizable and that much more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Nosyllaste

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case but the buttons don’t work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a fan of OtterBox for some time. They usually make good cases. This one, foe the iPad Mini 5th Gen, is sturdy and looks nice but the buttons are TERRIBLE. They make it impossible to control volume or turn the device off. It’s unclear if the just don’t line up over the iPad properly or if they’re just not made to move enough to effectively work. Overall, I’d say this one is a design failure that you don’t need to buy. OtterBox should address this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Cdino

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS IMPROVEMENTS
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a protective case without a front cover. I have this iPad mostly for home use. The case is quite sturdy, however I have to press excessively hard on the open/close button to get it to work. The sound buttons are inaccessible for the same reason and I find myself taking the case off to adjust the volume. When I do this the side panel falls off where the Apple Smart Cover could be attached. Unfortunately the return date had passed by the time I opened this as a gift. This would be a very good case if the on/off and volume buttons were redesigned.
customer_reviews.author: Molly O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Its very slim - exactly what my daughter wanted. No frills. Simple and clean look. Directions are weird, so that's probably why some people say it does not fit. Study for a second more and it goes on no problem. Attach a cover or like us, get a Zagg Invisible Shield to protect the screen and you have a very slim and protective solution. Plus when it gets all messed up, send it back and OtterBox will send a new one no questions, and same with Zagg. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Denenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great if you will be using Smart Cover and Apple Pencil
customer_reviews.text: Its Otterbox so if protection is what you need, this is pretty good product due to drop protection. Clear case design so it shows iPad design. I rated 3 overall because the product is not easy to hold and not simple if all you need is a case without the movable side and the holder for Apple pen. Great product if you will be using Smart Cover and Apple Pencil, otherwise may not be good investment.
customer_reviews.author: James Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: Either I got one that is faulty or this one just doesn’t fit the new iPad mini right because the top button doesn’t align practically at all and the volume buttons are off too. All three are very hard to work with the case on.
customer_reviews.author: fjmhb

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed by how after less than 6 months this case has fallen apart. The pen holds was the first thing to to and it has been all down hill since then. I had no problem paying the price I did for this case because it it a Otterbox of course and all their products are great but this was A COMPLETE FAIL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Protective, but makes iPad very difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: The parts of the case that cover the lock button and the volume buttons are so poorly designed that it makes it physically hard to click the buttons. It is nearly impossible to click the buttons successfully without grappling the device and exerting a lot of pressure. It is very frustrating and unappealing. I would return the product for a refund, however I do not have the original packaging and live far from a post office.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen de Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: The area where the pen holder is broke apart leaving jagged pieces. Extremely yellowed after 6 months use.
customer_reviews.author: Sreekanth

customer_reviews.title: Missed the mark by a lot
customer_reviews.text: The buttons were unbelievably hard to press, no way my 9 year old daughter could press them. An Amazon Basics charging cable wouldn't fit, neither would the Apple Pencil 1. I've been a long time Otterbox user buy they missed the mark with this one. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin

customer_reviews.title: My Review
customer_reviews.text: This case feels very nice and protective and works very well with the apple smart cover for the same iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Great for drone flying
customer_reviews.text: Works good with my controller for my drone with extension , good fit to controller no need to remove iPad from otter box
customer_reviews.author: HOT ROD

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Power Button and Volume doesn’t match that’s why it’s hard to press and damage item. There’s a cracked in the case. Need refund or replace a new one!!
customer_reviews.author: JohnGerald Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well with the iPad mini! you can remove a part so it works with the Smart Cover which i really liked! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: AshleyH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much, Protects my iPad very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As a pilot it fits all my needs from a case
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my airplane’s cockpit and it works great with RAM mounts
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Decent case, doesn't fit will if not using the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The case was designed primarily to accommodate the keyboard attachment. Without that accessory, you have to fit the case on in two pieces. the structural integrity of the case takes a huge hit on that side of the case, so you're always in danger of losing the case. I'm not confident in the ability to stay on and protect the corners if it is dropped. I miss Lifeproof cases, but they don't make one for the new Mini :(
customer_reviews.author: prime addict

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed Case, Side Panel Loose, Buttons Hard to Press
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most of the OtterBox cases that I've used for iPhone and iPad, this model for iPad mini is positively terrible. The case fits snugly around the iPad, but the buttons become very hard to press. Additionally, the side panel that is removable to allow for use of the smart cover is loose, and is held in place with just the iPad pressing against the rest of the case. That means it moves a round, and when you grip the edges of the iPad, it is wobbling. Terrible design from OtterBox.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: OtterBox’s lightest and minimalist case for the iPad mini.
customer_reviews.text: I like the symmetry series from OtterBox as it is more compact and more light weight than the defender or commuter series cases. It isn’t as protective but if you don’t need that level of protection it is very good for day-to-day activities in office, school and home environments. This clear version lets the aesthetics of your iPad mini shine through. It has plenty of grip even though the case is smooth. I do find the volume buttons to be a little bit hard to press. Hopefully this will become easier over time. I do like the Apple pen holder and removable side spine. These are new features that I haven’t seen before in a symmetry case.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Spirits

customer_reviews.title: Buttons are not responsive with this case
customer_reviews.text: I'm not overly thrilled with this case. The buttons on the iPad are near impossible to access or use with the case on. The button on the top doesn't respond well at all. I have to hit it several times to get it to turn off the screen. I don't like how the case fits on the iPad and I don't feel like it offers very good protection. There's hardly any lip on the front of the case to protect the screen if it should fall face down, After a day of using this case I opted or order a folio case from Speck.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Furkins' Human

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite protective case
customer_reviews.text: I don’t love this case. Having to purchase an additional piece after spending this much is ridiculous. I believe when you spend this kind of money on an Apple product, you absolutely protect your investment. In my opinion, that’s buying a whole case. This is my first OtterBox case. This isn’t the extraordinary product I expected for the price point. Perhaps other offerings from OtterBox are a better option.
customer_reviews.author: TheaCecelia

customer_reviews.title: Was hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: hard to get on and i dont think I will take it off. Other than that very snug fit and feel like this will protect my device well. Otter box is always my go to brand for electronics because they take forever to wear and break. so I am very happy to be able to add my ipad to the otterbox family :)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMom17

customer_reviews.title: Great otterbox case
customer_reviews.text: We buy otterbox automatically now whenever we purchase a new electronic device. I've dropped my iphone X countless times and its never broken. We purchased this for our new ipad and it works great. Our kids drop it often while playing games and we've never had a problem. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's a bit bulky for my tastes, but at least a name brand option for mini 5
customer_reviews.text: There are very few options for an iPad mini 5, so I appreciate this exists. It's a bit bulkier that I wished, and since I don't use a smart cover nor Apple Pencil, I don't see value in those features. But at least this is an option from a name brand company.
customer_reviews.author: Jong Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but expensive and not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice idea. But the spine doesn't like to go back in if you take it off for the Smart Cover to attach. Also, it's just one layer, so it won't be much use if you're rough on tech.
customer_reviews.author: E&E0715

customer_reviews.title: A great iPad case
customer_reviews.text: Otterbox is a great brand for a reason, they make products that work. This sits securely on the iPad and you know it's not going to break off. Plus it protects your ipad against drops and falls.
customer_reviews.author: The Anti Bridezilla

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and really stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Allows you to see your beautiful device clearly and keeps it super safe. The apple pen holder makes for great convince. Can’t go wrong with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Tracybeth

product_meta.title: OtterBox Symmetry Clear Series Case for iPad Mini (5th Gen ONLY) - Retail Packaging - Clear, Model Number: 77-62210
product_meta.description: The ultra-protective and slim iPad mini (5th gen) clear case, Symmetry Series, pops on easily and protects against drops, dings and scratches. Its spine removes to accommodate your Smart Cover. The clear case makes for easy viewing of asset tags. And there's a holder for your Apple Pencil.
feature_bullets: Compatible with iPad mini (5th Gen ONLY)
Slim case accentuates the precision lines of your iPad mini (5th Gen), while a clear back displays your iPad mini while protecting against drops and scratches
Secure your Apple Pencil in the loop and always know where it is and spine removes to attach your Smart Cover
Spine removes to attach your Smart Cover
Includes OtterBox limited lifetime warranty (see website for details) and 100% authentic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars174 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
